core / Party

Party

data class Party

A Party is well known (name, pubkey) pair. In a real system this would probably be an X.509 certificate.



Constructors

<init> Party(name: String, owningKey: PublicKey)

A Party is well known (name, pubkey) pair. In a real system this would probably be an X.509 certificate.
